posts.title: hexo+github搭建个人博客
posts.text: 1.准备工作 github账号 安装node.js 安装git for windows2.搭建github博客新建github名为.github.io的repo，username为你的github用户名配置ssh keyssh-keygen -t rsa -C “邮件地址”cd ~/. ssh将id_rsa.pub的内容贴到新建的ssh keys测试ssh -T git@github.comHi xxx! You’ve successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.则表示成功3.安装hexo打开git bash 输入npm install -g hexo新建一个博客目录，在目录内右键打开git bash或者cd到该目录，初始化hexo init12345678910.|-- _config.yml|-- package.json|-- public|-- scaffolds|-- scripts|-- source |-- _posts|-- themes|-- .deploy hexo g # 生成123$ hexo sINFO Start processingINFO Hexo is running at http://localhost:4000/. Press Ctrl+C to stop. 访问http://localhost:4000/即可看到内容 4.修改主题1$ git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git clone主题到themes目录修改_config.yml中的theme: landscape改为theme: yilia，然后重新执行hexo g来重新生成。 5.部署到github首先安装npm install hexo-deployer-git –save，否则提交会报错。修改_config.yml1234deploy: type: git repo: git@github.com:username/username.github.io.git branch: master 打开git bash，输入hexo d -g #生成并上传。成功后即可通过https://username.github.io/访问

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
